ygData.subject: Re: Conversation starter
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Darkwood with Silk is 23 dmg, 60 del, 150 rng 2) 2 Cams are statistically worse than 1 cam and a Planing Tool Shaped Oak 1-Cam Bow = 37.20 Ratio Rough Oak
ygData.messageBody:
1) Darkwood with Silk is 23 dmg, 60 del, 150 rng
2) 2 Cams are statistically worse than 1 cam and a Planing Tool
Shaped Oak 1-Cam Bow = 37.20 Ratio
Rough Oak 2-Cam Bow = 36.17 Ratio
3) I sell bows and arrows 1 to 5 dmg, and 50 to 150 rng, but on E'Ci sorry.

Charles


At 03:01 PM 6/14/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
>The guy I bought my Shaped Oak single cam bow from, offered to try to make
me a darkwood single cam, said he succeeded about 1 in 5, failed twice, and
was un-willing to try a 3rd time due to money. Stats were something along
the lines of 20 damage, 150 range, 35 delay (best I remember)
>
>BTW, I'm still looking for a double cam bow, and high damage long range
arrows, will pay very well.
>
>Salr D'Taynkk
>Dark Warrior of The Kith
>Veeshan
